name: Dark sso.itcsyd.dk login
description:
Now you can log in to something that is controlled by itcsyd.dk with a dark theme.
Wow.
If you use this, you most likely are interested in the stuff below:
Dark webskema - https://userstyles.org/styles/175682/dark-webskema
Dark ilearn - https://userstyles.org/styles/175681/dark-ilearn-eucsyd-dk
Dark unilogin - https://userstyles.org/styles/175209/uni-login-dark
